name: Test Delete Booking by ID with Error Status Code
description: This test is intentionally designed to verify handling of an error status code (403) when attempting to delete a booking.
descriptionHtml: This test is intentionally designed to verify handling of an error status code (403) when attempting to delete a booking.
statusMessage:
AssertionError:  Expected status code 200, but got 405
assert 405 == 200
 +  where 405 = <Response [405]>.status_code
